Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Network.Server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Network.Server.VirtualViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Network.Server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
SlotListener
public class VirtualView
extends VirtualViewObservable
implements SlotListener
This class implements a virtualView, which basically represents the connection between the network and the controller. There is one for each player.
